name: Six Pomegranate Seeds
description:
A young woman, a goddess, ventures into the realm of the dead in search of an artefact rumoured to contain mysterious power: the pomegranate seeds. Power, adventure,  love... what is it you seek?

Six Pomegranate Seeds is a visual novel re-imagining of the tale of Persephone's descent into the world of Hades.  Play as Seph as her curiosity drives her deeper into a strange realm. 

Features

  • Multiple endings. Your choices determine how Persephone's tale ends.
  • Interactive story. Steer Seph's decisions as she makes her her way deeper into the Underworld and meets its denizens.
  • Romance and intrigue.  Are you going to fall for the God of Death, or ally in a bid for power?
  • Original music, composed specially for the game!

Development

I intend to release SPS in three instalments (aside from the demo). More than half of the script is already written. and the art is well underway. This is a solo project, so my intent is to keep the scope relatively narrow. There is not a hard cap, however, and if the story I want to tell becomes longer, I will expand it accordingly. 

The game is going to be free, but you can support me on ko-fi (and gain access to some extra goodies in the future)!
